title: ParsedCommand
description: Logical structure of a Cursor command markdown file, parsed for validation. Required sections per AGENTS.md ยง6: Overview, Definitions, Prerequisites, Steps, Tools, Guidance.

definitions.description: Content of the ## Definitions section (domain terms, variables like {TASK_KEY}).

prerequisites.description: Content of the ## Prerequisites section (validation checks before execution).

content.description: Raw content of the ## Steps section.

numbers.description: Step numbers extracted from lines matching \d+\.

steps.description: Parsed ## Steps: content and at least one numbered step (1., 2., ...).

tools.description: Content of the ## Tools section (MCP and other tool documentation).

guidance.description: Content of the ## Guidance section (Role, Instruction, Context, Examples, Constraints, Output).

mcpRefs.description: All MCP tool references (mcp_Server_ToolName) found in the document. Optional; when present, each must match the pattern. mcps/ lookup not yet implemented.
